original_text: So the men had sex with her, as men have sex with prostitutes. That is how they had sex with Oholah and Oholibah, those two prostitutes. So the men had sex with her, as men have sex with prostitutes. That is how they had sex with Oholah and Oholibah, those two prostitutes.
korean_text: 그들이 그에게 나오기를 기생에게 나옴 같이 음란한 여인 오홀라와 오홀리바에게 나왔은즉

sentences.original_text: So the men had sex with her
as men have sex with prostitutes
That is how they had sex with Oholah and Oholibah
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 오홀라와 오홀리바와 성관계를 맺은 방식이 바로 그것이었다
